actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to increase authorization levels for loan guarantee programs of the Small Business Administration.
short_title: Small Business Recession Relief Act of 1992

summary.text: Small Business Recession Relief Act of 1992 - Amends the Small Business Act to increase the amounts for deferred participation loans and other financings authorized to be made by the Small Business Administration in FY 1992 through 1994.

titles.title: Small Business Recession Relief Act of 1992
To amend the Small Business Act to increase authorization levels for loan guarantee programs of the Small Business Administration.
